description: The Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) are a set of 17 sustainable development goals and 169 indicators announced by the United Nations in 2015. They provide a framework for governments, private businesses, and non-profit organizations worldwide to set long-term goals and sustainable development missions to promote economic prosperity while protecting the planet.

As a recycling company, our company supports and aligns with the core principles of the SDGs, incorporating them into our operational policies to promote a circular society. Going forward, we will continue to actively collaborate with our partners to achieve a balance between economic development, environmental protection, and social activism, aiming to contribute to addressing global sustainability issues.
